CheckTitle: Ensure Admin Consent Request Policy is Enabled
Description: Checks if the Admin Consent Request Policy is enabled in the tenant.
Risk: If the Admin Consent Request Policy is disabled, users may not be able to request admin consent for applications, reducing oversight and increasing risk.

Code.Other: 1. Go to Azure Portal (https://portal.azure.com). 2. Navigate to Azure Active Directory > Enterprise applications > Admin consent requests. 3. Enable the admin consent workflow.

Recommendation.Text: Enable the Admin Consent Request Policy to allow users to request admin consent for applications.

Notes: This check validates that the Admin Consent Request Policy is enabled in the tenant.
